price: İman edip de sâlih ameller işleyenlere gelince, onlar için Rahmân (çok merhametli olan Allah), (gönüllerde) bir sevgi yaratacaktır.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ سَيَجۡعَلُ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وُدّٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti sayajʿalu lahumu al-raḥmānu wuddan
